heading: HR00234
0: RESOLUTION OF THE MINORITY FOR THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION ON THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT (COA) 2018 AUDIT FINDINGS ON THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION (DEPED) RELATIVE TO VARIOUS ERRORS ON LEARNING MATERIALS INTENDED FOR GRADE 3 PUPILS VALUED AT OVER P254.3M, INCLUDING AN ALARMING NUMBER OF UNDISTRIBUTED INSTRUCTIONAL MATERIALS VALUED AT OVER P113M, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, FOR PURPOSES OF INSTITUTING REFORMS, REVIEW OF POLICIES AND ASSESSMENT OF DEPED
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2019-11-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00234
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION OF THE MINORITY FOR THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION ON THE COMMISSION ON AUDIT (COA) 2018 AUDIT FINDINGS ON THE DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION (DEPED) RELATIVE TO VARIOUS ERRORS ON LEARNING MATERIALS INTENDED FOR GRADE 3 PUPILS VALUED AT OVER P254.3M, INCLUDING AN ALARMING NUMBER OF UNDISTRIBUTED INSTRUCTIONAL MATERIALS VALUED AT OVER P113M, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, FOR PURPOSES OF INSTITUTING REFORMS, REVIEW OF POLICIES AND ASSESSMENT OF DEPED
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ABANTE, BIENVENIDO JR. M.
DATE FILED : 2019-08-14
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2019-11-27
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2019-08-27;
